title: Cluster Rocket II
summaries: The Cluster Rocket II is a type of rocket ammunition. Unlike the Cluster Rocket I, it destroys tiles. Unique from other rockets, cluster rockets shoot out shrapnel that create several secondary explosions which deal half of the base damage. These secondary explosions will destroy additional tiles.
Cluster Rocket IIs can be purchased from the Cyborg for 15 each during a Blood Moon or Solar Eclipse after the Martian Madness event has been defeated.

statistics.Buy: 15
statistics.Sell: 3
